column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////It's opening weekend
column2: and my boyfriend and I noticed the very very long lines for dinner service over the past couple days.  Fortunately
column3: we went for a late lunch instead
column4: and were seated promptly by a friendly waitress and greeted customarily by the whole staff.  The space is really nifty looking
column5: with deep orange lighting around booths
column6: two sets of bar seating (one at the ramen bar
column8: and two large family style tables with white rock inlays.  The set up really optimized the space
column9: fitting in many seats in a small restaurant without seeming too congested.
